Class DirectedGraphViewModel

Represents a directed graph, with supplementary data suitable for producing a 2D visual representation of the graph.

DirectedGraph digraph

| Improve this Doc View Source

DirectedGraphViewModel(DirectedGraph, float[], INodeIdMap)

Construct with the provided digraph, weights, and node IDs. The node positions array is allocated, but must be updated with actual positions outside of this constructor.

Declaration
